summary: Full-stack software engineer with 5 years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud architecture, and agile development. Passionate about clean code and mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led development of microservices architecture using Node.js and Express
Implemented real-time data processing with WebSocket and Redis
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Reduced API response time by 40% through optimization
Deployed and managed applications on AWS and GCP

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed React-based frontend applications with TypeScript
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
Designed PostgreSQL databases with complex relationships
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Collaborated with product and design teams in agile environment

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
description: Built responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Contributed to backend development with Python Flask
Participated in sprint planning and daily standups
Fixed bugs and improved code quality

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
